blocks.name: rlimcnp
blocks.content: Relate a limit of a real-valued sequence at infinity to the continuity of the function ` S ( y ) = R ( 1 / y ) ` at zero. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: rlimcnp2
blocks.content: Relate a limit of a real-valued sequence at infinity to the continuity of the function ` S ( y ) = R ( 1 / y ) ` at zero. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: rlimcnp3
blocks.content: Relate a limit of a real-valued sequence at infinity to the continuity of the function ` S ( y ) = R ( 1 / y ) ` at zero. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Mar-2015.)

thm rlimcnp3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(cmpt(s0, crp, c0), crli, c1), wcel(cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), cif(c1, c2, wceq(cv(s1), nat0))), cfv(co(c3, ccnp, c4), nat0))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wcel(c0, cc))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), wceq(c0, c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c4, crest, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  rlimcnp2(s0, s1, crp, c0, c1, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), c2, c3, c4, w0)
  ssidd(co(nat0, cico, cpnf), w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  0e0icopnf()
  a1i(w0, wss(crp, cr))
  rpssre()
  2thd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wcel(cv(s0), crp), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)), co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp))
  sylanbrc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)), co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0))))
  rpred(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp)))
  rpge0d(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)), crp))

  diff.cico.s(s1)
  diff.cpnf.s(s1)

  ⊣ c3 =(c4[|`t](0[[,)]+∞))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)

} = {

  simpr(w0, s0 ∈ ℝ+)
  sylanbrc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+), (1[÷]s0)∈(0[[,)]+∞), (1[÷]s0)∈ ℝ, 0[≤](1[÷]s0))
  rpred((1[÷]s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+))
  rpge0d((1[÷]s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ ℝ+, (1[÷]s0)∈ ℝ+)

blocks.name: xrlimcnp
blocks.content: Relate a limit of a real-valued sequence at infinity to the continuity of the corresponding extended real function at ` +oo ` . Since any ` ~~>r ` limit can be written in the form on the left side of the implication, this shows that real limits are a special case of topological continuity at a point. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2015.)

  adantr(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), crli, c2), wf(cmpt(s0, c3, c1), c3, cc))

blocks.name: efrlim
blocks.content: The limit of the sequence ` ( 1 + A / k ) ^ k ` is the exponential function. This is often taken as an alternate definition of the exponential function (see also ~ dfef2 ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:

thm dfef2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[~~>](exp ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ)→(c0 ` s0)=((1[+](c1[÷]s0))[^]s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, c0[~~>](exp ` c1), (hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦((1[+](c1[÷]hs0))[^]hs0))[~~>](exp ` c1))
  syl(w0, (hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦((1[+](c1[÷]hs0))[^]hs0))[~~>](exp ` c1), c1 ∈ ℂ)
  mpbid(c1 ∈ ℂ, (hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦((1[+](c1[÷]hs0))[^]hs0))[~~>](exp ` c1), (hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦((1[+](c1[÷]hs0))[^]hs0))[~~>r](exp ` c1))
  eqbrtrrd((hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦((1[+](c1[÷]hs0))[^]hs0)), crli, (exp ` c1), (hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦((1[+](c1[÷]hs0))[^c]hs0)), c1 ∈ ℂ)
  mpteq2dva(hs0, cn, ((1[+](c1[÷]hs0))[^c]hs0), ((1[+](c1[÷]hs0))[^]hs0), c1 ∈ ℂ)
  syl2anc((c1 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ), ((1[+](c1[÷]hs0))[^c]hs0)=((1[+](c1[÷]hs0))[^]hs0), (1[+](c1[÷]hs0))∈ ℂ, hs0 ∈ ℕ0)
  cxpexp((1[+](c1[÷]hs0)), hs0)
  rlimres2(hs0, cn, ((1[+](c1[÷]hs0))[^c]hs0), (exp ` c1), crp, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  a1i(c1 ∈ ℂ, ℕ ⊆ ℝ+)
  ssriv(hs0, cn, crp)
  nnrp(hs0)
  efrlim(hs0, c1, (0[(ball `(abs ∘ -))](1[÷]((abs ` c1)[+]1))))
  eqid((0[(ball `(abs ∘ -))](1[÷]((abs ` c1)[+]1))))
  rlimclim((hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦((1[+](c1[÷]hs0))[^]hs0)), (exp ` c1), cn, nat1, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  1zzd(c1 ∈ ℂ)
  fmpttd(hs0, cn, ((1[+](c1[÷]hs0))[^]hs0), cc, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  expcld((1[+](c1[÷]hs0)), hs0, (c1 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  sylancr((c1 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ), (1[+](c1[÷]hs0))∈ ℂ, 1 ∈ ℂ, (c1[÷]hs0)∈ ℂ)
  ax-1cn()
  divcld(c1, hs0, (c1 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  simpl(c1 ∈ ℂ, hs0 ∈ ℕ)
  adantl(c1 ∈ ℂ, hs0 ∈ ℕ, hs0 ∈ ℂ)
  nncn(hs0)
  adantl(c1 ∈ ℂ, hs0 ∈ ℕ, hs0 ≠ 0)
  nnne0(hs0)
  addcl(nat1, (c1[÷]hs0))
  adantl(c1 ∈ ℂ, hs0 ∈ ℕ, hs0 ∈ ℕ0)
  nnnn0(hs0)
  climeq(s0, (hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦((1[+](c1[÷]hs0))[^]hs0)), (exp ` c1), c0, cn, nat1, universe, c2, w0)
  nnuz()
  a1i(w0, (hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦((1[+](c1[÷]hs0))[^]hs0))∈ 𝕌)
  mptex(hs0, cn, ((1[+](c1[÷]hs0))[^]hs0))
  nnex()
  1zzd(w0)
  eqtr4d(((hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦((1[+](c1[÷]hs0))[^]hs0))` s0), (c0 ` s0), ((1[+](c1[÷]s0))[^]s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ ℕ, ((hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦((1[+](c1[÷]hs0))[^]hs0))` s0)=((1[+](c1[÷]s0))[^]s0))
  fvmpt(hs0, s0, cn, (hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦((1[+](c1[÷]hs0))[^]hs0)), ((1[+](c1[÷]s0))[^]s0), ((1[+](c1[÷]hs0))[^]hs0))

  expr(wa(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(cv(hs1), crp)), wcel(cv(s0), crp), wbr(co(cv(hs1), ccxp, co(nat1, cdiv, cneg(c0))), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), ccxp, c0))), clt, cv(hs1)))
  eqbrtrd(cfv(cabs, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), ccxp, c0))), clt, cv(hs1), co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), ccxp, c0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(cv(hs1), crp)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), crp), wbr(co(cv(hs1), ccxp, co(nat1, cdiv, cneg(c0))), clt, cv(s0)))))

blocks.name: sqrtlim
blocks.content: The inverse square root function converges to zero. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm sqrtlim(setvar s0) {
  |- wbr(cmpt(s0, crp, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(csqrt, cv(s0)))), crli, nat0)
} = {
  eqbrtrri(cmpt(s0, crp, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(csqrt, cv(s0)))), crli, nat0, cmpt(s0, crp, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), ccxp, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))))
  mpteq2ia(s0, crp, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), ccxp, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(csqrt, cv(s0))))
  oveq2d(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), ccxp, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cfv(csqrt, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), crp))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), crp), wceq(co(cv(s0), ccxp, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cfv(csqrt, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  rpcn(cv(s0))
  cxpsqrt(cv(s0))
  mp2b(wbr(cmpt(s0, crp, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), ccxp, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))), crli, nat0), wcel(nat1, crp), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), crp))
  1rp()
  rphalfcl(nat1)
  cxplim(s0, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cdiv, nat2)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sqrtlim(setvar s0) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ ℝ+ ↦(1[÷](sqrt ` s0)))[~~>r]0
} = {
  eqbrtrri((s0 ∈ ℝ+ ↦(1[÷](sqrt ` s0))), crli, nat0, (s0 ∈ ℝ+ ↦(1[÷](s0[^c](1[÷]2)))))
  mpteq2ia(s0, crp, (1[÷](s0[^c](1[÷]2))), (1[÷](sqrt ` s0)))
  oveq2d(nat1, cdiv, (s0[^c](1[÷]2)), (sqrt ` s0), s0 ∈ ℝ+)
  syl(s0 ∈ ℝ+, (s0[^c](1[÷]2))=(sqrt ` s0), s0 ∈ ℂ)
  rpcn(s0)
  cxpsqrt(s0)
  mp2b((s0 ∈ ℝ+ ↦(1[÷](s0[^c](1[÷]2))))[~~>r]0, 1 ∈ ℝ+, (1[÷]2)∈ ℝ+)
  1rp()
  rphalfcl(nat1)
  cxplim(s0, (1[÷]2))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cdiv, nat2)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: cxp2limlem
blocks.content: A linear factor grows slower than any exponential with base greater than ` 1 ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: cxp2lim
blocks.content: Any power grows slower than any exponential with base greater than ` 1 ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: cxploglim
blocks.content: The logarithm grows slower than any positive power. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: cxploglim2
blocks.content: Every power of the logarithm grows slower than any positive power. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-May-2016.)

blocks.name: divsqrsumf
blocks.content: The function ` F ` used in ~ divsqrsum is a real function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-May-2016.)

blocks.name: divsqrsum
blocks.content: The sum ` sum_ n <_ x ( 1 / sqrt n ) ` is asymptotic to ` 2 sqrt x + L ` with a finite limit ` L ` . (In fact, this limit is ` zeta ( 1 / 2 ) ~~ -u 1 . 4 6 ... ` .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-May-2016.)

blocks.name: divsqrtsum2
blocks.content: A bound on the distance of the sum ` sum_ n <_ x ( 1 / sqrt n ) ` from its asymptotic value ` 2 sqrt x + L ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm divsqrtsum2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, crp)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, c0), cmin, c2)), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(csqrt, c0))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, crp, co(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cfv(cfl, cv(s0))), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(csqrt, cv(s1)))), cmin, co(nat2, cmul, cfv(csqrt, cv(s0))))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, crli, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, crp)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, c0), cmin, c2)), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(csqrt, c0)))), diffsw(s1, w0))
  sylan(w0, wcel(c0, crp), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, c0), cmin, c2)), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(csqrt, c0))), wbr(c1, crli, c2))
  simp3i(wi(wa(wbr(c1, crli, c2), wcel(c0, crp)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, c0), cmin, c2)), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(csqrt, c0)))), wf(c1, crp, cr), wcel(c1, cdm(crli)))
  divsqrtsumlem(s0, s1, c1, c2, c0)
}

blocks.name: divsqrtsumo1
blocks.content: The sum ` sum_ n <_ x ( 1 / sqrt n ) ` has the asymptotic expansion ` 2 sqrt x + L + O ( 1 / sqrt x ) ` , for some ` L ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm divsqrtsumo1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, crp, co(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1), cmul, cfv(csqrt, cv(s0)))), co1))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, crp, co(csu(s2, co(nat1, cfz, cfv(cfl, cv(s1))), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(csqrt, cv(s2)))), cmin, co(nat2, cmul, cfv(csqrt, cv(s1))))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, crli, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  elo1d(s0, crp, co(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1), cmul, cfv(csqrt, cv(s0))), nat1, nat1, w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(crp, cr))
  rpssre()
  mulcld(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1), cfv(csqrt, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp)))
  1red(w0)
  adantrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1), cmul, cfv(csqrt, cv(s0)))), cle, nat1))
  eqbrtrd(cfv(cabs, co(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1), cmul, cfv(csqrt, cv(s0)))), cle, nat1, co(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1)), cmul, cfv(csqrt, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp)))
  eqtrd(cfv(cabs, co(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1), cmul, cfv(csqrt, cv(s0)))), co(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1)), cmul, cfv(csqrt, cv(s0))), co(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1)), cmul, cfv(cabs, cfv(csqrt, cv(s0)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp)))
  absmuld(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1), cfv(csqrt, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp)))
  rpcnd(cfv(csqrt, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp)))
  oveq2d(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1)), cmul, cfv(cabs, cfv(csqrt, cv(s0))), cfv(csqrt, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wceq(cfv(cabs, cfv(csqrt, cv(s0))), cfv(csqrt, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cfv(csqrt, cv(s0)), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(csqrt, cv(s0)))))
  rprege0d(cfv(csqrt, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp)))
  absid(cfv(csqrt, cv(s0)))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wbr(co(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1)), cmul, cfv(csqrt, cv(s0))), cle, nat1), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1)), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(csqrt, cv(s0)))))
  divsqrtsum2(s1, s2, cv(s0), c0, c1, w0)
  lemuldivd(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1)), cfv(csqrt, cv(s0)), nat1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp)))
  abscld(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp)))
  recnd(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp)))
  syl2anr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp), wcel(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1), cr), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  rlimrecl(s0, c1, crp, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(csup(crp, cxr, clt), cpnf))
  rpsup()
  eqbrtrrd(cmpt(s0, crp, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), crli, c1, c0, w0)
  feqmptd(s0, c0, crp, cr, w0)
  a1i(w0, wf(c0, crp, cr))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cr))
  ffvelrni(cv(s0), crp, c0, cr)
  divsqrsumf(s1, s2, c0)
  resubcl(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c1)
  1red(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crp), wcel(cfv(csqrt, cv(s0)), crp))
  rpsqrtcl(cv(s0))
  diff.crp.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm divsqrtsumo1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ ℝ+ ↦(((c0 ` s0)[-]c1)[×](sqrt ` s0)))∈ O(1))
  ⊣ c0 =(s1 ∈ ℝ+ ↦(sum(s2 ∈(1[...](⌊ ` s1)),(1[÷](sqrt ` s2)))[-](2[×](sqrt ` s1))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[~~>r]c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  elo1d(s0, crp, (((c0 ` s0)[-]c1)[×](sqrt ` s0)), nat1, nat1, w0)
  a1i(w0, ℝ+ ⊆ ℝ)
  rpssre()
  mulcld(((c0 ` s0)[-]c1), (sqrt ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+))
  1red(w0)
  adantrr(w0, s0 ∈ ℝ+, 1[≤]s0, (abs `(((c0 ` s0)[-]c1)[×](sqrt ` s0)))[≤]1)
  eqbrtrd((abs `(((c0 ` s0)[-]c1)[×](sqrt ` s0))), cle, nat1, ((abs `((c0 ` s0)[-]c1))[×](sqrt ` s0)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+))
  eqtrd((abs `(((c0 ` s0)[-]c1)[×](sqrt ` s0))), ((abs `((c0 ` s0)[-]c1))[×](sqrt ` s0)), ((abs `((c0 ` s0)[-]c1))[×](abs `(sqrt ` s0))), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+))
  absmuld(((c0 ` s0)[-]c1), (sqrt ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+))
  rpcnd((sqrt ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+))
  oveq2d((abs `((c0 ` s0)[-]c1)), cmul, (abs `(sqrt ` s0)), (sqrt ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+))
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+), (abs `(sqrt ` s0))=(sqrt ` s0), ((sqrt ` s0)∈ ℝ ∧ 0[≤](sqrt ` s0)))
  rprege0d((sqrt ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+))
  absid((sqrt ` s0))
  mpbird((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+), ((abs `((c0 ` s0)[-]c1))[×](sqrt ` s0))[≤]1, (abs `((c0 ` s0)[-]c1))[≤](1[÷](sqrt ` s0)))
  divsqrtsum2(s1, s2, s0, c0, c1, w0)
  lemuldivd((abs `((c0 ` s0)[-]c1)), (sqrt ` s0), nat1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+))
  abscld(((c0 ` s0)[-]c1), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+))
  recnd(((c0 ` s0)[-]c1), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+))
  syl2anr(w0, s0 ∈ ℝ+, ((c0 ` s0)[-]c1)∈ ℝ, (c0 ` s0)∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  rlimrecl(s0, c1, crp, (c0 ` s0), w0)
  a1i(w0, sup(ℝ+, ℝ*, <)= +∞)
  rpsup()
  eqbrtrrd((s0 ∈ ℝ+ ↦(c0 ` s0)), crli, c1, c0, w0)
  feqmptd(s0, c0, crp, cr, w0)
  a1i(w0, (c0 : ℝ+ → ℝ))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ ℝ+, (c0 ` s0)∈ ℝ)
  ffvelrni(s0, crp, c0, cr)
  divsqrsumf(s1, s2, c0)
  resubcl((c0 ` s0), c1)
  1red((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ ℝ+, (sqrt ` s0)∈ ℝ+)
  rpsqrtcl(s0)
  diff.crp.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}
